title: First Blog Update!
author: tinyplayerss
longDescription:
Ads help support me, the developer behind HyteServe, and allow the platform to stay updated with new content, tools, and features for the Hytale community.

If you use an ad blocker, I kindly ask that you consider whitelisting HyteServe. Ads are currently the main way I can keep the project alive and continue serving Hytale fans around the world with the content they’re looking for.

The ad network I’ve partnered with is Adsterra, which made it possible to set up fast, lightweight ads without disrupting your experience. If you’re not a fan of ads, no worries — I promise they will never block content or get in the way of browsing.

I would never allow ads that negatively impact the user experience.

title: Adsterra Security Patch: Solving Redirect Issues
author: tinyplayerss
description: We have implemented a patch to block malicious redirects from our ad provider.
longDescription:
Maintaining a safe and seamless experience on HyteServe is my top priority. Recently, I noticed that some Adsterra ads were causing unauthorized redirects, taking users away from our site to external pages. I have officially deployed a patch to address this.

The update includes stricter filtering on the ad scripts and the implementation of 'sandbox' attributes where possible to prevent the ads from triggering window-level redirects. This ensures that while ads still support the site, they can no longer hijack your browsing session.

If you still encounter any strange behavior or unexpected pop-ups, please reach out so I can continue to refine the security of our ad implementation.
